ShopItem.Name: Chicken Barn
ShopItem.Description: This will house your chicks nice and cozy. This automaticly produces 2 eggs every seconds and 1 egg if you click it.

ShopItem.Name: Cow Barn
ShopItem.Description: This will house your cows nice and cozy. This automaticly produces 2 milk every seconds and 1 milk if you click it.

ShopItem.Name: Sheep Barn
ShopItem.Description: This will house your sheep nice and cozy. This automaticly produces 2 wool every seconds and 1 milk if you click it.
